forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 71. Southwest wind 3 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As night settles over Downtown San Francisco, the city is wrapped in a gentle cloak of clouds, holding onto the peaceful remnants of a warm summer day. The temperature hovers at a comfortable 56 degrees, with a soft west-southwest breeze whispering through the streets. Tonight's partly cloudy skies cast a serene ambiance, perfect for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or an intimate gathering at a cozy café, where the glow of city lights creates a welcoming warmth against the cool evening air.

As dawn approaches, the promise of a sun-kissed Wednesday unfurls. Expect clear skies that will beckon the vibrant colors of the day to come, complimented by a pleasant high near 71 degrees. A light breeze will play through, with bursts of wind providing just enough playful energy to keep the air invigorating. The marine layer may reach for the hills, clinging to the coastline, leaving some of the iconic views slightly softened but beautifully ethereal. This is a day made for casual exploration—consider sauntering through the vibrant streets of the Mission, capturing the spirit of the city in its street art and culinary delights. Dressing in layers will serve you well; a light sweater in the morning and a short-sleeve top in the afternoon will keep you comfortable, allowing you to embrace all that this San Francisco day has to offer.
